content: Trying to run the latest ig publisher. I am geting a null pointer exception on line 573 of Publisher.jar in igtools. It appears that lloyd made some changes to that line 6 hours ago, and am wondering if maybe it was unintentially broken. Or maybe there is something different I need to do now? Anyone have any idea what's up?
@Lloyd McKenzie broke it and went on holiday? how unusual... I will try and find some time to look at it
@Sean McIlvenna Sorry for causing issues. I did run it locally before committing, so may have been something that wasn't triggered by the IG I tested against.
